description: Nestled amid the wine estates and rolling hills of Monferrato, this historic farmhouse has been carefully restored its enthusiastic owners. The restaurant here serves contemporary dishes inspired by regional and Italian recipes, as well as offering welcoming guestrooms (one or two with their own kitchen), a saltwater swimming pool and the relaxing ambience that comes with this rural setting.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
